mapper.insert: insert into TB_CART(cart_no, product_no, product_qty, product_price, product_total, product_title) values (seq_cart.NEXTVAL, #{product_no}, #{product_qty}, #{product_price}, #{product_price} * #{product_qty}, #{product_title})
mapper.select:
select c.cart_no cart_no, p.product_no product_no, p.product_title product_title, c.product_qty product_qty, p.product_price product_price, (p.product_price * c.product_qty) product_total from TB_CART c, TB_PRODUCT p where p.product_no = c.product_no
order by c.cart_no
select nvl(sum(p.product_price * c.product_qty), 0) product_total from TB_CART c, TB_PRODUCT p where c.product_no = p.product_no
mapper.update: update TB_CART set product_qty = #{product_qty} where product_no = #{product_no}
